articles.description: Heard of haemophilia or fibromyalgia? Here’s a look at some famous people and the health issues they grapple with.

articles.title: Cameron's big final quarter sees Tall Blacks into Asia Cup semis - 1News
articles.description: The Tall Blacks outscored South Korea 28-18 in the final quarter to win 88-78, with Flynn Cameron contributing half of his team's scoring in that time.
articles.content:
The Tall Blacks have booked a trans-Tasman clash in the Asia Cup playoffs after taking down South Korea in the quarter-finals on Friday morning.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Asia Cup 2022 will be held in UAE, says BCCI president Sourav Ganguly - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) on Wednesday had informed the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) that the board will not be in a position to host the upcoming edition of the Asia Cup T20 because of the economic and political crisis in the country.
articles.content:
The Asia Cup, which was scheduled to be held in Sri Lanka, has been shifted to the UAE, BCCI president Sourav Ganguly said here on Thursday. 
"Asia Cup will be in UAE, as it is the only place where … [+681 chars]

articles.title: Indonesian police open to exhuming body in alleged affair case - The Star Online
articles.description: JAKARTA (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Indonesian police are open to exhuming the remains of a bodyguard who was allegedly murdered for having an affair with the wife of a police general, if the victim's family requests a second autopsy.

articles.title: ZoukOut Singapore returns to Sentosa in December after three-year hiatus - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Held at Siloso Beach across two days (Dec 2 and 3), this 2022 edition is organised by Zouk Group, in a first-time partnership with AEG, producers of world-renowned Coachella.
articles.content:
ZoukOut first started out 22 years ago in Singapore with 8,000 party attendees and grew to a peak of 50,000 festival goers in 2014.
